aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Mohammad Abdullah
aboutData.subtitle: A Software Engineer
aboutData.text: I am a results-driven software engineer with a strong foundation in Full stack applications, specializing in crafting responsive and user-centric web applications. With a proven track record in e-commerce projects, I excel in optimizing performance and integrating seamless payment gateways. As an AWS Solutions Architect, showcasing my expertise in designing and implementing scalable cloud solutions. i Leverage my technical skills and AWS knowledge and provide leadership in architecting robust cloud infrastructures, addressing complex challenges, and collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams. Committed to continuous learning, I stay abreast of industry trends to deliver innovative solutions tailored to clients' business objectives

services.title: Cloud Archetecting on AWS
services.text: As an AWS SAA, my role is to be the keeper of the AWS Well Architected Framework pillars, ensuring customers are following best practices, guidance, and recommendations to develop cloud solutions that are secure, resilient, efficient, and managed with operational excellence.

services.title: Software Engineer Lifecycle
services.text: As a software engineer i deal with the design, development, testing, and maintenance of software applications.

services.title: Database Management
services.text: Design optimized SQL and NoSql databases to implement the pillars of DB infrastructure, Data Integreity, Data Consistency, Data Recovery (by including backups)

services.title: Clean Code
services.text: I write a code that's easy to read, maintain, understand and change through structure and consistency yet remains robust and secure to withstand performance demands

skillData.title: Gained Those Skills Working In The Software Engineering World Over the Past 4 Years
skillData.text: Learning new skills & developing my self espicially in a revolutionary field like the IT field is a must, previously my main focus was on learning new languages/frameworks which is not necessarily wrong, but the system design/archeticture should have priority and that's what focusing more on now.

portfolioItems.title: Wowly
portfolioItems.subTitle: Software/Cloud Development
portfolioItems.description: WOWLY is an Amazon Go-like project where customers in shopping malls can start and finish shopping using a smart trolley, including checkout. As the team lead, I was responsible for designing and architecting a comprehensive smart POS solution. This solution includes an admin panel with multi-level permissions and roles, analytics dashboards, a POS system integrated directly into the cart, Visa machine integration, and a robust data synchronization feature. Additionally, I led the implementation of CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions to ensure smooth and continuous product delivery on a scalable AWS infrastructure. I Built and deployed an application to the cloud ON s3 for static web hosting and an application load balancer and EC2 servers to host my backend as well as RDS to host my 'mysql' database

portfolioItems.title: React Kanban
portfolioItems.subTitle: Kanban task manager
portfolioItems.description: Built a kanban task manager with react, where you can define boards, tasks, kanban lanes
